Content.en-gb:
Dear {membercode},

Congratulations, you've won a lucky mystery packet.

Prize details:
Amount: {redpackvalue} {currency}
Requires {rollover} rollover before withdrawal

If you require further clarifications, please contact Customer Service Team.

Sincerely yours,
Customer Service Team
Content.zh-cn:
尊敬的会员 【{membercode}】，您好
恭喜，您获得一个红包

红包详情：
金额：{redpackvalue} {currency}
{rolloverAmount} {currency} 流水才能提款 ({rollover}倍)
奖金将在活动结束后一小时发放到您的余额里

如有疑惑，请联系客服。

此致，
牛八客服团队

Content.en-gb:
恭喜您，

中奖 ”{prizename}“请联系客服领取您的奖品哦，感谢一路的支持

每月 8 18 28 日，千万豪奖
